Class STime

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.dmsxml.STime
public final class STime extends Object
Time convenience methods.
Author:
Michael Darter, Douglas Lau

  • Method Details

    • calcTimeDeltaMS

      public static long calcTimeDeltaMS(long startInUTC)
      Calc time difference between now (UTC since 1970) and given start time in MS.

    • getCurTimeShortString

      public static String getCurTimeShortString()
      Get current time as short string in local time.

    • getCurTimeShortString

      public static String getCurTimeShortString(boolean local)
      Get current time as short string in either UTC or local time. e.g.: '23:98:74'

    • getCurDateTimeString

      public static String getCurDateTimeString(boolean local)
      Get current date and time as string in either UTC or local time. e.g. '2006-10-09 19:48:48'

    • CalendarToXML

      public static String CalendarToXML(Calendar c)
      Convert from a Calendar to XML in UTC format.
      Parameters:
      c - Calendar
      Returns:
      XML date string in UTC: format 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'. e.g. 2008-03-22T02:04:21Z 01234567890123456789

    • XMLtoDate

      public static Date XMLtoDate(String xml) throws IllegalArgumentException
      given a date in XML time format (UTC), return a Date. this method only handles times in the format below. Note the terminating Z indicates UTC. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' 01234567890123456789
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an illegal date string is received.
